about_the_game:
Rise as a Drift Master and Missile Car Mechanic in DRIFT ISLAND!

Welcome to DRIFT ISLAND, the ultimate open-world drifting playground where you don’t just drive—you shred every corner in style. Build your own missile car, fine-tune its guts, and let loose on the legendary Drift Island. Whether you’re a veteran sideways slider or fresh to the scene, DRIFT ISLAND offers an immersive, high-octane experience that puts you in control of every detail of your drift machine.

Key Features:

  • Early Access Drifting Action
    We’re launching in Early Access so you can join us on this journey to perfect the drift experience. Expect regular updates packed with new parts, legendary drift cars, track expansions, and engine upgrades—designed with the feedback of dedicated drifters like you.

  • Build & Customize Your Missile Cars
    From iconic JDM legends to the most popular engines around, tune every aspect of your ride. Swap in high-performance parts, adjust suspension geometry, fiddle with the turbo, and push your car to its limit. But be warned: a poorly tuned engine can blow—literally! Master the art of tuning to avoid costly explosions and keep your drift missile in prime condition.

  • Legendary Drift Island
    Explore an open-world environment built for sliding. Take on serpentine mountain roads, industrial zones, and hidden spots that’ll test your skills behind the wheel. Rack up drift points, impress other gearheads, and uncover new challenges as you leave smoking rubber in your wake.

  • Intense Damage System & Repairs
    Ride the ragged edge long enough and your car will start to show it. Smacking guardrails, clipping barriers—collisions and mechanical failures are part of life on Drift Island. Keep your missile car in top shape by repairing broken parts or face the risk of your precious engine giving up mid-drift.

  • Earn Cash, Upgrade, Repeat
    Drifting doesn’t pay the bills—so grab a side gig as a food delivery driver and use your souped-up car to make those quick runs around the island. Earn money, invest in better parts, and keep upgrading your missile car until it’s a bona fide drifting monster.

Are you ready to shred, break, and rebuild your way to the top? Join DRIFT ISLAND in Early Access and help shape the future of drifting games. Gear up, drop the clutch, and become a true legend on the island!

name: DRIFT ISLAND

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400 or AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 2060 6GB or similar
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700 or AMD Ryzen 5 3600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX 2070 or AMD Radeon 5700XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
